channel.title: ip on Spade Three
channel.description: Recent content in ip on Spade Three

item.title: Php Ip
item.description: php getId function getIP() { if (isset($_SERVER)) { if (isset($_SERVER['HTTP_X_FORWARDED_FOR'])) { $realip = $_SERVER['HTTP_X_FORWARDED_FOR']; } elseif (isset($_SERVER['HTTP_CLIENT_IP'])) { $realip = $_SERVER['HTTP_CLIENT_IP']; } else { $realip = $_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR']; } } else { if (getenv("HTTP_X_FORWARDED_FOR")) { $realip = getenv( "HTTP_X_FORWARDED_FOR"); } elseif (getenv("HTTP_CLIENT_IP")) { $realip = getenv("HTTP_CLIENT_IP"); } else { $realip = getenv("REMOTE_ADDR"); } } if(empty($realip) || strtolower($realip)=='unknown'){ return ''; } return $realip; }
